versos: (heth) Psalm 119:57 - "heth. Thou art my portion, O Lord: I have said that I would keep thy words.";;;

(amorite) Joshua 10:12 - "On the day the Lord gave the Amorites over to Israel, Joshua said to the Lord in the presence of Israel: 'Sun, stand still over Gibeon, and you, moon, over the Valley of Aijalon.'";;;
(maiden) Song of Solomon 1:3 - "Pleasing is the fragrance of your perfumes; your name is like perfume poured out. No wonder the young women love you";;;
(issachar) 1 Chronicles 12:32 NIV - "from issachar, men who understood the times and knew what Israel should do200 chiefs, with all their relatives under their command;";;;
(spread) Matthew 9:31 - "But they went out and spread the news about him all over that region.";;;
(border) Numbers 34:12 - And the border shall go down to Jordan

(comest) Revelation 2:10 - "Fear none of those things which thou shalt suffer: behold, the devil shall cast some of you into prison, that ye may be tried; and ye shall have tribulation ten days: be thou faithful unto death, and I will give thee a crown of life.";;;
(gerar) Genesis 26:1 - Now there was a famine in the landbesides the previous famine in Abrahams timeand Isaac went to Abimelek king of the Philistines in gerar.;;;
(gaza) Zephaniah 2:4 - "gaza will be abandoned and Ashkelon left in ruins. At midday Ashdod will be emptied and Ekron uprooted.";;;

(manifest) 1 Timothy 3:16 - "And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness: God was manifest in the flesh, justified in the Spirit, seen of angels, preached unto the Gentiles, believed on in the world, received up into glory.";;;
(eber) Genesis 10:21 - To eber were born two sons: one was named Peleg, because in his time the earth was divided; his brother was named Joktan.;;;
(arphaxad) Genesis 10:24 - "arphaxad fathered Shelah, and Shelah fathered Eber.";;;
(peleg) Genesis 10:25 - "Two sons were born to Eber; one was named peleg, because in his time the earth was divided.";;;
(ophir) 1 Kings 10:11 - "The navy of Hiram, which brought gold from ophir, also brought from ophir a great plenty of almug wood and precious stones.";;;
(mount) Psalm 24:3 - "Who may ascend the mountain of the Lord Who may stand in his holy place";;;
(brick) Exodus 1:14 - and made their lives bitter with hard labor in brick and mortar and with all kinds of work in the fields.;;;
